section.title: NAME
section.simpara: ipmctl - Utility for managing Intel Optane DC persistent memory modules (DCPMM)

listitem.simpara: Run ipmctl help command.

section.title: DESCRIPTION
section.simpara: Utility for managing Intel Optane DC persistent memory modules (DCPMM)

listitem.simpara: Discover DCPMMs on the platform.
Provision the platform memory configuration.
View and update the firmware on DCPMMs.
Configure data-at-rest security on DCPMMs.
Monitor DCPMM health.
Track performance of DCPMMs.
Debug and troubleshoot DCPMMs.
Shows information about one or more DCPMMs
Shows the total DCPMM memory resource allocation
Shows basic information about the physical processors
Shows the platform supported DCPMM capabilities
Shows the topology of the memory installed

section.title: MEMORY SUBSYSTEM PROVISIONING
section.simpara: Provision the platform memory configuration and configure data-at-rest security on DCPMMs.

listitem.simpara: Changes the security passphrase on DCPMM
Changes the DCPMM security lock state
Creates a memory allocation goal on one or more DCPMM
Creates a memory allocation goal on one or more DCPMM
Stores the current system configuration in a file
Enable data-at-rest security on DCPMM
Erases the persistent data on one or more DCPMMs
Load a memory allocation goal from a file onto DCPMMs
Shows the memory allocation goal on one or more DCPMM
Retrieves a list of persistent memory regions

section.title: INSTRUMENTATION
section.simpara: Monitor health and track performance of DCPMMs.

listitem.simpara: Changes the threshold or enabled state for DCPMMs sensors
Shows performance metrics for one or more DCPMMs
Shows health statistics for one or more DCPMMs

section.title: SUPPORT AND MAINTENANCE
section.simpara: View and update the firmware on DCPMMs. Other support and maintenance commands.

listitem.simpara: Modifies one or more user preferences
Dumps a support snapshot to a file
Shows help for the supported commands
Changes the configurable setting(s) on one or more DCPMMs
Shows detailed information about the firmware
Shows basic information about the host server
Displays a list of the DCPMM software user preferences
Updates the firmware on one or more DCPMMs.
Shows the DCPMM host software versions
Dumps encoded firmware debug logs from DCPMM
Injects an error or clears a previously injected error
Runs a diagnostic test
Shows the system ACPI tables related to the DCPMMs
Shows thermal or media errors on the specified DCPMMs
Shows the platform configuration data for one or more DCPMMs
Dumps the active session to a file
Loads a session from a file into memory
Displays information about an active session
Starts a recording or playback session
Stops a recording or playback session

section.title: SEE ALSO
section.simpara: ipmctl-show-device(1), ipmctl-show-memory-resources(1), ipmctl-show-socket(1), ipmctl-show-system-capabilities(1), ipmctl-show-topology(1), ipmctl-change-device-passphrase(1), ipmctl-change-device-security(1), ipmctl-create-goal(1), ipmctl-create-goal(1), ipmctl-delete-goal(1), ipmctl-dump-goal(1), ipmctl-enable-device-security(1), ipmctl-erase-device-data(1), ipmctl-load-goal(1), ipmctl-show-goal(1), ipmctl-show-region(1), ipmctl-change-sensor(1), ipmctl-show-performance(1), ipmctl-show-sensor(1), ipmctl-change-preference(1), ipmctl-dump-support(1), ipmctl-help(1), ipmctl-modify-device(1), ipmctl-show-firmware(1), ipmctl-show-host(1), ipmctl-show-preferences(1), ipmctl-update-firmware(1), ipmctl-version(1), ipmctl-dump-debug-log(1), ipmctl-inject-error(1), ipmctl-start-diagnostic(1), ipmctl-show-acpi(1), ipmctl-show-error-log(1), ipmctl-show-pcd(1) ipmctl-dump-session(1) ipmctl-load-session(1) ipmctl-show-session(1) ipmctl-start-session(1) ipmctl-stop-session(1)
